# Instructions

This repository contains the scripts used for in the manuscript:
*Breast Tumors Maintain a Reservoir of Subclonal Diversity During Primary Expansion*

Scripts are provided in the format of a package to reproduce paper figures.

Bincounts and segmented cells dataset are available in `extdata/`.

Scripts are available in the folder `R`.
